name: Line 6 POD HD300 Edit Preset File

description: To create the H3E file, alter your settings, select File → Save As... , name the file, choose the save location, and click Save .
To open the H3E file, double-click the file or select File → Open , navigate to the file, and click Open .
In Mac, the default save location for H3E files is in the following directory: /​Documents/​Line 6/​Tones/​POD HD300 Edit
In Windows, the default save location for H3E files is in the following directory: My Documents/​Line 6/​Tones/​POD HD300 Edit
NOTE: The H3E extension was replaced by .H4E when POD HD400 Edit was released. Also, if you want to save more than one preset at a time, create an .H3B file, which can save up to 128 presets.
